column4: Traffic;Kampot (Arey News): At 11:00 am on 31st of August 2018 at Prek Thnout village
column6: Kampot Province there was a traffic accident
column7: involving 56-year-old IGOR BURUSOV from Uzbekistan. He lost control of the vehicle
column8: hit a bridge and was thrown form the car. He died instantly at the scene.------Warning! Graphic images of the scen in link------http://www.arey-news.com/archives/257299------ ------View post on imgur.com
